name: Hextech Rocketbelt
tooltip:
Hextech Rocketbelt

Cost: 3200


UNIQUE Passive - Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.

UNIQUE Active - Supersonic: Dash in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of rockets that deal 200 − 300 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Then, gain 75% bonus movement speed toward enemy champions for 2 seconds (40 second cooldown). Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
